data.why:
A Module which allows autonomous HTML FORM creation, modification
    and saving.

    The module allows templates to be created (using HTML) which, can
    be modified saved, etc. without any CGI logic (other than the
    instaniation of the proposed module).

    The module is in use internally (at my employer) and has been
    tested thouroughly over the past two years.

    I am open to namespace suggestions and will provide additional
    information if desired.

    Thanks, Marc Aitkin
